DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : - To prove efficacy superiority reduce genital odor increase hydration mucosa genital comparing use Dermacyd ( different fragrance ) Glycerine Vegetal Soap Granado Traditional Secondary Objective : - To evaluate safety normal condition use , verify clinical sign lab exam .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Perfect mucosa product analysis region Volunteers active sexual life : normal Papanicolau test perform less one year mandatory Bacterioscopy describe vaginal flora Negative Trichomonas vaginalis test Negative Whiff test Willingness use preservative sexual intercourse study period Use category cosmetic product Willingness follow study procedure present clinic day schedule time medical evaluation application occlusion Exclusion criterion : Use antiinflammatory / immunosuppression / antihistaminic drug Atopic allergy history cosmetic product Active cutaneous disease ( local and/or disseminate ) evaluate area Disease cause immunosuppression , diabetes , HIV , etc . Endocrine pathology thyroid disease , ovarian adrenal gland disturbs Intense solar exposure ( get tan ) 15 day evaluation Gynecologic treatment four week evaluation Any vaginal infection detect inclusion Other condition consider investigator reasonable exclude patient study . The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
